example:
() => (
  <Stack direction="column">
    <CountryFlag code="cz" name="Czech Republic" />
    <Stack direction="row" spacing="XXSmall" align="center">
      <CountryFlag name="" code="cz" />
      <Text>Czech Republic</Text>
    </Stack>
  </Stack>
)

info.title: Accessibility
info.description: When the flag is used alone, include the name of the country for people who won't see the flag. If the country name is present in the text, include a blank name to make it clear it's just decoration.
